attributes.additional_details:
Ban all advertising of alcohol just like what was done with cigarettes.
My boyfriend is a recovering alcoholic and i have become more aware of the amount of advertising on the television, in magazines and billboards.
Everywhere you go, it is in your face!

rejection.details: This request should be submitted to the Scottish Parliament Public Petition website: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/vli/publicinfo/htsapp/Index.htm
